caption.p:
Cell viability determined by MTT assay. Hs27 skin fibroblasts were seeded at a density of 10,000 cells/well in 96-well plates and allowed to incubate overnight to attach to the surface. Next day, treat the cells with TA extracts (fresh and dry leaf, stem, and root extracts) for 4 h along with quercetin as a positive control (16 μg/mL) and control as untreated. Data shown as mean ± SEM; n = 3 and
∗
p < 0.05.
